name: BreastRadUSMargin
title: US Margin
description:
Breast Radiology Ultra-Sound Margin Observation

If this observation is present, and dataAbsentReason is empty, then a mass margin was observed.


If this observation is present, and dataAbsentReason is not empty, then a mass margin was not observed and dataAbsentReason contains the reason why.


The margin is the edge or border of the lesion. The descriptors of margin, like the descriptors of shape, are important predictors of whether a mass is benign or malignant. 
-- Bi-Rads® Atlas — Mammography Fifth Ed. 2013 
*** TODO Items ***** Is Irregular incorrect? Note from ACR B.3.A. 'Irregular' is not used to group these marginal attributes because irregular describes the shape of a mass.
** Is non-circumscribed a stand along value, or implied by selection fo on or more non-circumscribed values?
